User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://dapsiwow.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for polite crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin or sensitive paths (if any)
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /uploads/
Disallow: /encrypted/

# Allow all tools and categories
Allow: /finance
Allow: /health
Allow: /text
Allow: /image
Allow: /all-tools
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
Allow: /privacy
Allow: /terms
Allow: /help

# Google specific
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

# Bing specific  
User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /
